audition.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a short performance by an actor, singer etc that someone watches to judge if they are good enough to act in a play, sing in a concert etc
audition.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I’ve got an audition for the Bournemouth Symphony Orchestra on Friday.
audition.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to take part in an audition
audition.translation[1].definitions[1].d: to watch and judge someone’s performance in an audition
audition.translation[1].definitions[1].e: We auditioned more than 200 dancers before deciding on Carole Ann.
